name: Upload Files Into the PDF.co
description:
Effortlessly upload files from Google Drive to PDF.co's temporary storage for quick access and processing. Ideal for short-term file handling and automation of tasks like conversion, merging, or extraction.

About PDF.co:
PDF.co specializes in PDF processing solutions. This template was created by PDF.co and has not been tested by Make. For support, contact support@pdf.co.
